    		California State University, Chico
    	Find Your MajorWith more than 385 academic offerings in person and online, we have the right program to match your passions.Why Choose Chico?Known for our beautiful campus and community feel, Chico State offers high-quality, affordable education.Explore Student LifeYou belong in the Wildcat family, where students are active, engaged, and care for one another.Take a TourCost & AidHow to ApplyApply to Chico StateDare to create the career and life you want to lead—apply now for 2023! Join our community of Wildcats ready to take on any challenge and transform themselves and the world in the process.Apply NowYou don't have to take our word for it—Chico State has been a U.S. News & World Report top-10 regional public university in the West for more than 20 years!Chico State TodayNews and UpdatesSoon-to-be Theatre Arts Graduate Has Played a Starring Role OffstageStudents Travel, Grow, and Build Friendships Through Speech and Debate TeamMolecular Biology Student Turns ‘Beautiful Disasters’ into Lifelong Call to ServiceChallenging the Status QuoDiscrimination and inequities in our society have unjustly impacted communities of color and people of varied sexualities, gender identities, religions, ability, body size, and many other intersectional identities. Because of this, historically underserved populations have not had equal opportunity for educational success. Chico State has made equity, diversity, and inclusion our top strategic priority to challenge and change that status quo on our campus and in society.Equity, Diversity, and InclusionOur CommitmentResources for StudentsResources for Faculty & StaffCalendar of EventsCampus CalendarAcademic CalendarTake the Next StepsEnroll TodayLearn about Cost and AidSchedule a Tour(opens in new window)Call us Monday–Thursday, 8 a.m.–5 p.m., to talk directly to an admissions expert. No automated voice messages—we promise!Office of Admissions:530-898-6322  |  info@csuchico.eduWe acknowledge and are mindful that Chico State stands on lands that were originally occupied by the first people of this area, the Mechoopda, and we recognize their distinctive spiritual relationship with this land, the flora, the fauna, and the waters that run through campus.We are humbled that our campus resides upon sacred lands that since time immemorial have sustained the Mechoopda people and continue to do so today.MenuChico State HomeAboutAcademicsAdmissionsCost & AidStudent LifeAcademic DepartmentsAthleticsAlumniParentsChico FactsGiveResourcesQuicklinksCampus CalendarCampus SafetyJob OpportunitiesAccessibility Resource CenterAnnual Security Report (PDF)
We acknowledge and are mindful that Chico State stands on lands that were originally occupied by the first people of this area, Mechoopda, and we recognize their distinctive spiritual relationship with this land, the flora, the fauna, and the waters that run through campus. We are humbled that our campus resides upon sacred lands that since time immemorial have sustained the Mechoopda people and continue to do so today.Contact UsNeed Help?FacebookFacebookTwitterTwitterInstagramInstagramReport an accessibility issueReport a broken link on this pageTitle IXPrivacy PolicyCalifornia State University, Chico400 West First StreetChico, CA 95929Copyright © 2023 All Rights Reserved
